channel.title: Desert fury sword EDITED
channel.description:
things to do [size=10pt]put more detail into the hilt[/size]
[IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd416/XXXXRUBYXXXX/000.jpg[/img]
[size=24pt]couldent thing of anything to put on the end on the sword so i put a ball till i figure out a desighn for it any1 got any ideas for it ? plus i got rid of the stick out bit that som1 didnt like and changed to colors to what som1 els said aswell...[/size]

item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Try making th blade a lighter colour, because right now it looks like a dog peed on it. Instead of the ball you should have just left it or put a different primative there, it really just stuffed the whole thing up. Just keep at it and you’ll be fine.

item.description:

[quote=“orcashark, post:19, topic:396809”]Ripped the name and Concept from Fable 3 from what i see… Or maybe its just a coincidence?

Ontopic: Not even gonna go there… Read what everybody else said… All i can say it make the blade look more blade-like… Like sharper… It looks dull in model and square in wideframe to me…[/quote]
coincidence and im working on it trying to make the wireframe beter and adding the colours that have bin said

Read full topic

item.title: Desert fury sword EDITED
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Ripped the name and Concept from Fable 3 from what i see… Or maybe its just a coincidence?

Ontopic: Not even gonna go there… Read what everybody else said… All i can say it make the blade look more blade-like… Like sharper… It looks dull in model and square in wideframe to me…

item.title: Desert fury sword EDITED
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Infinity Death, post:17, topic:396809”]OK, we need to stop this argument once and for all, amy, your not a dip shit you helped me out on how to make a model so your especially not a dip shit.
Demolish, if someone gives you CC that’s good not bad so take her criticism and use it instead of being a dumb ass and start a shitty argument.[/quote]
Exactly what i was thinking.

Also i do suggest you try the sandy colours as infinity death said, but make the blade a silver or something because it seems more realistic.

Read full topic

item.title: Desert fury sword EDITED
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

OK, we need to stop this argument once and for all, amy, your not a dip shit you helped me out on how to make a model so your especially not a dip shit.
Demolish, if someone gives you CC that’s good not bad so take her criticism and use it instead of being a dumb ass and start a shitty argument.
@Topic: OK, you need to find desert colors, you can use a dark brown as a color for the handle and a sandy color for the hilt, for the blade you can make a sand yellow and make it lighter as you go up as in make a lot of colors and make it kinda fade but that’s just my opinion.

Read full topic

you were being a dipshit i know loads of people who post models befor there acualy finished with colors and the design
